author: jianyunt
body:
1. Created contributing-to-powershell.md under /docs/ as discussed in the last meeting. This doc will be directly linked from the new version of PowerShell/PowerShell/readme.md; it stitches all process/guidelines together based on an end user experience. 
2. Copied some contents from the existing .github/contributing to the contributing-to-powershell.md 
3. Moved some of contents from the .github/contributing to git\basics.md
4. removed .github\contributing.md
title: Initial draft of the contributing-to-powershell.md
